mapper.insert: insert into e_user_tb(userId, userPw, userNm, userType) values(#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userNm}, #{userType})
mapper.select:
select ep.pointChargeNum as pontChargeNum, ep.userId as userId, pp.pointprodname as pointprodname, to_char(ep.pointChargedIndate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as pointchargedindate
from e_point_tb ep join e_pointproduct_tb pp on ep.pointprodnum = pp.pointprodnum where ep.userId like #{userId} order by ep.pointChargeNum
